After a while abby pulls him off and pats his back. He let's out a small burp feore falling asleep. "Wow, you seem like you have done this before." "No I haven't Kyle i simply watched a video on what to do..." "Must have been really good then." "Are you trying to sweet talk me?" "No I think one is enough..." "And if I want another?" "We will discuss it..."

You both go to lay the baby down in the crib for bed as you both head to bed yourself...

155332212.content: So a Lopunny married an anthro..... sure why not. Okay, now decide what you are.
155332212.title: Anthro

1553322121.content:
You're a Pichu, an anthro Pichu to be more specific. Despite others often making fun of how unnaturally young you look, you feel lucky that your wife loves you. You first met her when she was a Buneary, and she began teasing you a bit as well, but as you two started talking you became friends, and later on mates. Anyway your story here begins at home, you're just reading a book, when suddenly you hear the door open.

"Evening honey!" You hear your Lopunny wife call you.

"Evening!" You reply, turning around to kiss her. You turn around, but she stands you up for a hug. You embrace her, despite her being a whole head taller than you.

"How was your day?" She asked, letting go of you.

"Same old, same old." You reply.

"Same here, I'm gonna go have a shower real quick." She says, and goes into your bedroom. You decide to be nice and pick up her bag and work clothes in your room. You begin to hang up her clothes when you notice something buried in the closet, a little blue book. You pick it up to discover it's a diary, your wife's journal. You open it up the cover, and see a picture of her as a teenage Buneary taped on the first page. You quickly shut the book, what in the world were you doing? But still, you two were soulmates, she'd understand your curiosity. You open up the diary and began flipping through the pages, nothing really interesting until you reach the last page, which was from just last night.

"It's 3:00 A.M, and I'm having a hard time sleeping again. Just watching him makes me wish I had the confidence to do so much with him, but I don't know how he'd take it at all. I just think he'd never look at me the same way again if he found out my fetish, _______"
1553322121.title: Choice #1

15533221211.content: Your pink cheeks turn a deep red, and you quickly put the book back. You think of Lopunny's words, how you'd never look at her the same way again. You begin to think it over, it might not be your thing, but you love her so much that a little embarrassment would be fine. How to break it to her was the big question though?
15533221211.title: Tickling + Bondage

choices: You wake up, but still nothing's happened.
155332212111.content:
You decide to try and tell her subtly that you don't mind her fetish, and to do that, you decide to leave the book somewhere special. You pick it up and set it under a pile of workout bands, hoping that would inspire her. You finish cleaning up and leave the room to give your Lopunny some privacy. Time passes and she still hasn't said anything to you, and to make sure, you slyly walk by your room to see her sitting there with her diary, so she had to see the bands. You don't want to embarrass her and press her about it, so you go on with your normal evening routine with her.

"Goodnight hon." You tell her.

"Goodnight baby." She says snuggling her little Pichu.

Your name is Nick and your a pokemon lover you love them so much that you have desided to marry one and you also love anthro pokemon.

You can choose between anthro and normal.
The Poke Talker is in this story if you choose a normal pokemon
Vore is now welcome just no hard vore blood is not welcome and do digestion ether.
All pokemon are female so there is no gay marriges.
Other humans can be added.
Legendarys can be married at the start.
